name: Payout Panic
description:
Description

You play as a pilot that works for a fairly stingy company that you have to pay out of pocket to upgrade your ship (for each second until you run out of money). But! you can still use the normal ship if you want. Don't forget using the nicer weapons will ALSO come at a price. Though the enemy team luckily has some change to spare for you. 

Use your money wisely to finish the mission and hopefully make a decent profit.

This game was made by our team, Team Panic, as part of Global Game Jam 2022. The source code is available to use/download.

Controls

  • Z - Normal Shot (Free!)
  • X - Missile Shot ($5)
  • C - Wide Shot ($5)
  • A - Repair Shields ($100)
  • Space - Toggle Fancy Ship ($60 a second)
  • Shift - Focus
  • F5 - Fullscreen
  • F12 - Panic Button?

Credits

  • Lyricismly - Music
  • rowlna - Art
  • not-tomo - Programming
  • bixbite - Playtesting and Sound Effects
